comments.author: SanderVanGennip
comments.body:
I have had the exact same issue with Live Charts 2 (which uses SkiaSharp). My development laptop ran fine with version 3.119.0, but after publishing this to our application server I got this error.

Downgrading to 2.88.9.0 resolved the issue, so for now I'm happy. I am slightly worried though that a 'release' version has issues like this. I've already spent over a week just getting things to work with 3.119.
